messages.messageBody:
<BG>
come on over! I'll teach you a few redneck-gone-punk
things....
(did you say VA? I wasn't paying attention before,
sorry....I love VA!! I've only been there once, for a
few weeks, but I loved it. It's really pretty.)
-Bobbie

messages.subject: English unschooler heading your way!
messages.msgSnippet: My kind of person Bobbie. Have to get together when I arrive in the states. I ll throw a big party! (and teach you yanks to speak :) ) That was a joke!!!!!!
messages.messageBody:
My kind of person Bobbie. Have to get together when I arrive in the states. I'll throw a big party! (and teach you yanks to speak :) )
That was a joke!!!!!!
I'm pretty excited about moving to the US now. Have to dye my hair boringly normal for the interviews with the INS then back to weird and wonderful. Home-schooling looks pretty difficult in VA but I'm up for a challenge ;)
Look out America, here comes me!

Shyrley (who missed the Mayflower, but better late than never)

Bobbie wrote:

 
 

I was just discussing what my next color will be with
my "betend sis in law".
I've been doing this growing out thing (pics of my
long hair got the best of me) but I don't know how
much longer I can handle this whole auburn soft
"motherly" look. (Though my mom LOVES it) <g> (soft
being not spikey...it is still every which way...
that's just something I can't help).. I'm either going
to have to do a drastic dye job (maybe just blackest
black possible..it's been awhile since that one) or
chop it off again.

-Bobbie
who says
YAY for english wierdo punk people!
(and new mexican ones too) <g>
